mapper.select: select to_char(p.CREATEDAT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS createdateString, o.ordernum, o.usernum, to_char(DECODE(p.type,'card',o.paytotal+o.charge,0),'999,999,999,999,999')as pay1, to_char(DECODE(p.type,'trans',o.paytotal+o.charge,0),'999,999,999,999,999')as pay2 FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p ON o.ordernum = p.ordernum where p.CREATEDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY p.CREATEDAT DESC

select to_char(DECODE(sum(o.paytotal + o.charge),null,0,sum(o.paytotal + o.charge)),'999,999,999,999,999')as sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p ON o.ordernum = p.ordernum
WHERE o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel'
WHERE p.CREATEDAT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel'
WHERE p.CREATEDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel'
WHERE p.CREATEDAT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel'

SELECT to_char(sum(a.sumPrice)/ COUNT(*),'999,999,999,999,999')as avgPrice FROM
( SELECT TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate , sum(o.paytotal+ o.charge)sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p on o.ordernum=p.ordernum WHERE p.createdat BETWEEN TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE((SELECT max(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE((SELECT max(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(( SELECT min(to_char(createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM payment),'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.hiredate(+) ORDER BY b.dt

( SELECT TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hiredate , sum(o.paytotal + o.charge)sumPrice FROM orders o INNER JOIN payment p on o.ordernum=p.ordernum WHERE p.createdat BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND o.orderstatus = 2 AND p.type != 'canceled' AND p.type != 'cancel' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.createdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.hiredate(+) ORDER BY b.dt
